summary: A young extraterrestrial, separated from its family and stranded on Earth, finds friendship with a boy in a wheelchair.

reviews.content: This is the shittiest knock off of E.T. I've ever seen.Like it's so obvious it's trying to copy E.T.I hated this movie so much 😤
I actually enjoyed this quite a bit, other than clear advertisements, bad acting and clear et rip off, yes it's a bad film but it's also fun I recommend!!

If you are here now in 2023 and talking bad about this movie then you are just copying what someone else has said. in 1988 this movie was good. in fact i liked it better than ET.  ET was just big because of the actors in it. Mac and Me had action, and had a handicapped person with in that action. in todays world that is beyond a + and no one see's that yet will complain about it regardless. in 1988 which one of you 1 star people thought about coke and or McDonalds? I surely didn't even notice it at 8 years old. I liked the movie then and i like it now good enough to show my children.

MYSTERY SCIENCE THEATER 3000 - Season 12, Episode 1.
It's a testament to the power of produce placement that I was so distracted by the McDonald's spots that I didn't even realize the movie was also plugging Coke. Impressive. 

Not the movie though, it was terrible. 

Best Riffs:
"Yeah keep trying music. This isn't that interesting."

"Whoa, that's a lot of cumin!"

"I will swallow your soul!"

"You know they went through three Erics making this."

Sorry it took so long. "I had to construct a waking nightmare."

"They'll be throwing a break dance benefit to stop an evil land developer from tearing down their McDonald's." 

"Drop it or I blow this kid's brains out."

"Call in the airstrike!"

"Well, it looks like you're free to go."

"Produce placement finishing move!"
no. no. no. no. no. no.
The waffle house has found it's new host
Just a bad rip off and not watchable
a rip off and not a good one.

Best movie ever slayed so much shame on Steven Speelburg for ripping off this amazing movie I watched it and I was amazed at the great acting and CGI everyone should watch this amazing film so sad it has so much rip offs 🤪😍😍💅💅💅💅💅🥰🥰
